title: ‘Scandalous headlines, aggravating communal tensions’: I&B ministry pulls up TV channels for coverage of Delhi violence, Ukraine war - The Indian Express
content:
1. ‘Scandalous headlines, aggravating communal tensions’: I&B ministry pulls up TV channels for coverage of Delhi violence, Ukraine war  The Indian Express
  2. Centre Expresses 'Serious Concern' About Television Coverage Of Ukraine-Russia Conflict, Jahangirpuri Violence  ABP Live
  3. "Scandalous Headlines, Unverified Footage": Government Note To Channels  NDTV
  4. ‘Scandalous headlines, communal overtones in remarks’: Govt pulls up TV channels on coverage of Ukraine crisis  Times Now
  5. ‘Refrain from airing misleading, provocative content:’ Centre to TV channels  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: A Ministry of Information and Broadcasting advisory asked channels to ‘immediately refrain from publishing and transmitting any content which is violative of the aforementioned provisions of The Cable Television Networks (Regulation) Act, 1995’.
